metrics.name: Carrier Change Rate
metrics.description: Rate of Freight Orders that have a carrier change
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) 
	FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Change Carrier')
	)
/
COUNT(case_id) 
*100

metrics.name: Carrier Rejection Rate
metrics.description: Rate of Freight Orders that were rejected by Carrier
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) 
	FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Freight Order Rejected by Vendor')
	)
/
COUNT(case_id) 
*100

metrics.name: Freight Settlement Cancellation Rate
metrics.description: Rate of Freight Settlements that were cancelled
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) 
	FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Cancel Settlement')
	)
/
COUNT(case_id) 
*100

metrics.name: Late Delivery Rate
metrics.description: Rate of Freight Order that were executed a defined period of time after the defined delivery date
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(WHERE
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER
    (WHERE event_name IN ('Confirm Execution Done')))
	- "FRO Delivery Date"
	> DURATION ${late_delivery_duration}
    AND "FRO Delivery Status" = '03')
/ 
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE "FRO Delivery Status" = '03')

metrics.name: Med. Cycle Time FRO Confirmation by Vendor
metrics.description: Median Cycle Time from Send Freight Order to Vendor to Freight Order Confirmed by Vendor

metrics.name: Med. Cycle Time FRO Creation to Execution Cancellation
metrics.description: Median Cycle Time Freight Order Creation to Cancel Execution

metrics.name: Med. Cycle Time FRO Creation to FSD Creation
metrics.description: Median Cycle Time Freight Order Creation to Freight Settlement Document Creation

metrics.name: Med. Cycle Time FSD Creation to Cancel Settlement
metrics.description: Median Cycle Time Freight Settlement Document Creation to Cancel Settlement

metrics.name: Number of Cases with Process Continuation after Cancellation
metrics.description: Number of cases with events happening after a cancellation event
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT( case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Cancel Freight Order (Tech.)') 
    AND NOT EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Cancel Freight Order (Tech.)')
    OR (EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Cancel Execution') 
	AND NOT EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Cancel Execution'))
	OR (EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Cancel Settlement') 
	AND NOT EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Cancel Settlement'))
)

metrics.name: Freight Order Cancellation (Tech.) Rate
metrics.description: Rate of Freight Orders that were technically cancelled
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) 
	FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Cancel Freight Order (Tech.)')
	)
/
COUNT(case_id) 
*100

metrics.name: Freight Order Execution Cancellation Rate
metrics.description: Rate of Freight Orders that were cancelled during execution
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) 
	FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Cancel Execution')
	)
/
COUNT(case_id) 
*100

metrics.name: Freight Orders executed on time
metrics.description: Number of Freight Orders that were executed on or before the defined delivery date
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(WHERE
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER
	    (WHERE event_name IN ('Confirm Execution Done')))
		-"FRO Delivery Date" <= DURATION ${late_delivery_duration}
	AND "FRO Delivery Status" = '03')

variables.name: late_delivery_duration
variables.description: Duration after which time a delivery is defined as late. For example: '1days'
